abstract: In his new job in Britain, Winfried F.W. Bischoff has a chance to redeem himself after a frustrating experience in the United States.
snippet: In his new job in Britain, Winfried F.W. Bischoff has a chance to redeem himself after a frustrating experience in the United States.
lead_paragraph: On paper, Winfried F. W. Bischoff  whose most recent job was a brief stint at the helm of the heavily damaged Citigroup  has all the qualities one would expect in an incoming chairman of the equally troubled Lloyds Banking Group, one of Britain’s most storied banking names.

headline.main: A Leader Is Called On to Turn Around Lloyds
headline.print_headline: For Lloyds, A Leader And a Test
